description: Main entry point for a Vue.js application, importing styles and setting up app components, plugins, and mounting the app.

methods.name: createApp
methods.description: Function from Vue to create a new application instance.

methods.name: use
methods.description: Method to register plugins or additional features including state management ('Pinia') and routing.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Method to mount the Vue app to the DOM element with id 'app'.
